item.title: Dungeons and Dragons is Testing a New Class
item.description:
Summary

  • The Psion is a new Intelligence spellcaster class being tested in Dungeons and Dragons, focusing on mental abilities like telekinesis and telepathy.
  • The first new D&D class in six years, the Psion has four subclasses, 20 levels of progression, and Wild Talent feats.
  • Players can customize the Psion with Psionic Disciplines, as well as enter Offensive and Defensive Psionic Modes.

Dungeons and Dragons is testing a brand-new class in the form of the Psion, an Intelligence spellcaster who focuses on mental abilities such as telekinesis and telepathy. Featuring four subclasses, 20 levels of progression, and Wild Talent feats, the Psion is the first new class to come to Dungeons and Dragons in nearly six years.

The Psion, sometimes called the Psionicist, is a psychic class that has appeared in many Dungeons and Dragons editions in the past. In 2017, D&D playtested a version of this concept called the Mystic for 5th Edition , and though it never saw print, parts of it manifested in official subclasses like the Psi Warrior Fighter and the Soulknife Rogue.

Now, Dungeons and Dragons is taking another swing at a psionic class. This Unearthed Arcana playtest document introduces the Psion as a brand-new base class – the first of its kind since the Artificer was released in 2019. The Intelligence spellcaster can use Psionic Energy dice to perform feats of mental prowess and empower their rolls, and can enter an Offensive and Defensive Psionic Mode to adapt to combat. Players can further customize the class with Psionic Disciplines, which provide more ways to use Psionic Energy to perform special attacks or to enhance their spells and ability checks.

Dungeons and Dragons 5th Edition Psion Class Highlights

  • Intelligence spellcaster
  • D6 Hit Dice
  • Intelligence and Wisdom saving throw proficiency
  • Skill proficiencies: two from Arcana, Insight, Intimidation, Investigation, Medicine, Perception, Persuasion
  • No armor proficiencies, simple weapon proficiency
  • Enhance spells and rolls with Psionic Power
  • Enter Psionic Modes to improve offense and defense
  • Further customize class with Psionic Disciplines
  • Four subclasses:
    • Metamorph
    • Psi Warper
    • Psykinetic
    • Telepath

The Psion has four subclasses available to it: the Metamorph, Psi Warper, Psykinetic, and Telepath. Metamorphs can temporarily modify their flesh, extending their limbs and transforming parts of their body into weapons or armor, while the Psi Warper bends reality to teleport themselves, their allies, and their foes around the battlefield. Meanwhile, the Psykinetic is a master of telekinetic protection and destruction, with a strong focus on powerful Dungeons and Dragons spells like Shield, Telekinetic Crush, and Telekinesis, and the Telepath is the ultimate mentalist, able to more effectively read minds, communicate telepathically, and shatter psyches.

Beyond the Psion, this Unearthed Arcana also introduces Wild Talents, a new category of Dungeons and Dragons feats based on niche forms of psionics. From the emotional Empath and divining Clairsentience to the elemental mastery of Cryokinesis and Pyrokinesis, these feats all grant useful traits inspired by their psionic area of expertise, and include access to a handful of flavorful spells as well. Though they have no other prerequisites, these feats are all mutually exclusive – once a character takes a Wild Talent, they cannot take another.

It is unclear where the Psion might officially appear, as none of the current in-development Dungeons and Dragons books seem to fit the psionic theme. The survey for the Psion opens on June 3, so fans interested in shaping this class ahead of its full release should be sure to provide feedback after that point.

item.title: Monopoly GO: How to Get Darth Maul Token
item.description:
The newest addition to the ever-growing lineup of Monopoly GO ’s Star Wars collectibles is the fearsome Darth Maul token. The Darth Maul token embodies the dark side with striking detail, capturing his menacing presence and dual-bladed lightsaber. If you’ve collected all the Star Wars-themed cosmetic items so far, you’ll surely want to add this one to your Monopoly GO shelves too.

How To Get the Darth Maul Token in Monopoly GO

After the Luke and Yoda token, the Darth Maul token storms onto the scene, bringing the power and intensity of the dark side to your Monopoly GO collection. With his iconic double-bladed lightsaber and striking red-and-black appearance, the Darth Maul token is a must-have for fans who want to embrace the darker side of the Force.

You can get the Darth Maul token as the grand prize in the ongoing Jedi Partners Event in Monopoly GO . This thrilling event launched on May 27, 2025, and will run for about five days, wrapping up around June 1, 2025.

In the Jedi Partners Event, you’ll partner up with four of your Monopoly GO friends and build Star Wars-themed attractions. As you and your partners hit milestone goals together, you’ll earn points that move you closer to the grand prize. This exclusive reward features a limited-edition Darth Maul token, a generous number of dice rolls, and a Swap Pack.

As a limited-edition collectible, this exclusive Darth Maul token won’t be around forever, so make sure to team up with reliable partners and work together to unlock the grand prize before the event ends in Monopoly GO .

All Rewards in Monopoly GO Jedi Partners Event

The Jedi Partners Event features four unique builds, each requiring 80,000 points to complete. That means you and your partners will need to collect a total of 320,000 points to finish all four builds and claim the final rewards.

Here’s a quick overview of the milestone rewards you can earn during the upcoming Jedi Partners Event. Each of the four partner attractions features five milestones, and as you progress with each partner, you can win a ton of prizes, as mentioned below.

Milestone

Rewards

Level 1

  • 200 Dice Rolls

Level 2

  • Cash Prize

Level 3

  • 200 to 300 Dice Rolls
  • Cash Prize
  • 10-minute Cash Boost

Level 4

  • 300 to 500 Dice Rolls
  • 20-minute Mega Heist
  • Yellow Sticker Pack

Level 5

  • 400 to 600 Dice Rolls
  • Cash Prize
  • 30-minute Builder’s Bash
  • Blue Sticker Pack

item.title: Fortnite Announces Sabrina Carpenter Event
item.description:
Summary

  • The Dance With Sabrina event in Fortnite will run from May 30 to June 16.
  • This event features a mini-game in which players must try to match their character's emotes to the beat of Sabrina Carpenter songs.
  • It is unknown if this game mode will feature any cosmetic or XP rewards.

Fortnite has announced a music event featuring Sabrina Carpenter, set to take place on the Jam Stage starting May 30. Fortnite Festival is a permanent Guitar Hero -like game mode in Fortnite in which players must select which part of a band they'd like to challenge: Vocals, Bass, Drums, or Guitar. They then must hit the notes in sync with the music that their character is playing. The better they play, the more stars they will earn at the end of the performance.

Sabrina Carpenter has been the face of Fortnite Festival Season 8, which gave fans access to themed cosmetics as well as her songs and music tracks. The Season 8 Music Pass features a Sabrina Carpenter skin, instruments, and jam tracks, but there are additional Sabrina Carpenter cosmetics that they can buy in the Item Shop during this time.

On June 17, the Sabrina Carpenter Fortnite Festival season comes to an end, but before then, gamers can enjoy over two weeks of celebrations with the Dance With Sabrina event. From May 30 until June 16, players can visit the Jam Stage to join the Sabrina Carpenter dance party taking place in Fortnite . This event features a mini-game in which gamers must try to match their character's emoting to the beat of the Sabrina Carpenter songs. Three players who do well will be chosen to help run the show, where they may step into the role of of Dance Leader, Special Effects Pro, or Video Artist.

When Is the Sabrina Carpenter Event in Fortnite Festival?

  • From Friday, May 30, at 3 PM ET until Monday, June 16, at 11:59 PM ET

If players are chosen to take on one of these roles, they will have an impact on how the show goes, whether it's by selecting the backdrop, picking the dancer's emotes, or choosing the visual effects. For now, it is unknown if this game mode will feature any cosmetic or XP rewards, but it is quite common for Epic to include exclusive quests and rewards when hosting these events. Regardless, it seems like a fun, interactive event to keep players distracted while they wait for the end of this Fortnite season.

A while back, there were rumors that there would be a Sabrina Carpenter concert in Fortnite , and it is likely that this event is it, as the teaser trailer shows Sabrina singing as players dance along. Even if it's not what players initially expected, they still have the opportunity to see her act in-game, and if they're among the players who match the most beats during the show, they'll appear in the final snapshot next to Sabrina at the end of the session.

Create, play, and battle with friends for free in Fortnite. Be the last player standing in Battle Royale and Zero Build, experience a concert or live event, or discover over a million creator made games, including racing, parkour, zombie survival, and more. Each Fortnite island has an individual age rating so you can find the one that's right for you and your friends.

Explore large, destructible environments where no two games are ever the same. Team up with friends by sprinting, climbing and smashing your way to earn your Victory Royale, whether you choose to build up in Fortnite Battle Royale or go no-builds in Fortnite Zero Build.

Discover even more ways to play across thousands of creator-made game genres: adventure, roleplay, survival and more. Or, band together with up to three friends to fend off hordes of monsters in Save the World.

item.title: How to Redeem Roblox Gift Cards
item.description:
The Roblox ecosystem continues to grow, with more and more developers creating high-quality experiences that players just can't pull themselves away from. While it's a free-to-play game, there are some in-game purchases that players can make to make things more enjoyable, reduce the time they have to wait for certain things to happen in different games, or just to buy some in-game items.

For this, you'll need to pay real-life money to get Robux (or a Premium subscription), and that's where Roblox Gift Cards provide a safe and easy way to add credit to your account.

If this is your first time redeeming a Roblox gift card, or you've just not done it in a while, this guide will take you step-by-step through the process.

How to Redeem Roblox Gift Cards

  1. Go to roblox.com/redeem. This is the only way they can be redeemed. You cannot redeem gift cards in the Roblox mobile app or on your console .
  2. Log in to your Roblox account (or create one if you don't have one already).
  3. Find the PIN/Code and enter it into the Code box on the webpage. The PIN can be found behind a scratch pane on the back of a physical gift card. If it's a digital gift card, the code is usually just listed within the email.
  4. Click the 'Redeem' button.
  5. A message should appear confirming that you've added credit to your Roblox account.

What Can Roblox Gift Cards Be Used For?

Roblox gift cards can be used to purchase Robox or Roblox Premium. Robux is an in-game currency used to purchase things across all Roblox experiences . This might be in-game items, or 'speed-ups' which reduce the amount of time you have to wait to be able to perform an action or for an in-game shop's inventory to rotate/refresh. Some games also allow you to create a private server by spending Robux.

Roblox Premium gives subscribers a monthly stipend of Robux to spend. The amount varies depending on the level of Premium monthly subscription you get:

  • Premium 450 grants 450 Robux
  • Premium 1000 offers 1000 Robux
  • Premium 2200 offers 2200 Robux

All levels of Roblox Premium also offer access to Premium benefits within experiences, such as Premium-only levels, items and boosters. A subscription also gets you 10% more Robux on each Robux purchase you make, and also unlocks the ability for you to trade items with other players.

How to Buy Robux

  1. To buy Robux, select the gold Robux icon in the top right-hand corner of the screen when you load up the Roblox Player app. This will take you to the page shown above, where you can then choose to purchase the desired amount of Robux.
  2. Click on the option you want, and then choose to pay with the credit you have on your account.
  3. There is also an option to 'Convert Remaining Credit to Robux.'
  4. Click 'Buy' and your remaining credit will be converted automatically for you.

How to Buy Roblox Premium

  1. To buy Roblox Premium, click on the 'More' option on the left-hand side of the Roblox Player app.
  2. Within this menu, select the 'Premium' option and then click on 'Subscribe Now' below the level of subscription that you want.
  3. Confirm that you want to use your Roblox Credit to purchase the subscription and click 'Pay and Subscribe.'
  4. Your subscription will now be active for one month.

Keep in mind that once this month is up, you'll need to have another payment method on your Roblox account, or more credit, to keep the subscription running. If you don't, the subscription will end, and you'll need to sign up again.

item.title: Grow a Garden: How to Get the Celestial Mutation
item.description:
If it weren't for mutations, making money in Grow a Garden would honestly feel like a chore. Thankfully, there are tons of them now that can make your crops worth way more. While there used to be just a few variants, the list keeps growing with every update, so you can easily farm more Sheckles even with cheap crops.

The Celestial Mutation is one of the best mutations out there - if not the best . It can make your fruits ridiculously valuable, whether it’s a one-time harvest like Mushrooms or a reharvestable crop like Moon Mango. Here's a look at what the Celestial Mutation is and how to get it on your fruits quickly.

How to Get the Celestial Mutation in Grow a Garden

Celestial is a special mutation that boosts your crop’s value up to 120x its original price . To get Celestial Mutation in Grow a Garden , you’ll need to wait for a Meteor Shower and hope your crops get struck by falling stars.

The Meteor Shower works just like other weather events (i.e., Frost, Thunderstorm, or Rain). During it, shooting stars fall across the server every seven seconds. If one lands near your crops, the nearby fruits can turn Celestial.

However, there’s a catch: Meteor Showers only have a 33.3% chance of happening during Night or Blood Moon events. They usually last between five and eight minutes after one of those events ends. Most importantly, you have to be online during it; the mutation won’t trigger if you’re offline. To increase your odds, you can also use a Star Caller to summon shooting stars and aim for this mutation faster.

How to Get and Use Star Caller in Grow a Garden

As the name suggests, the Star Caller is a tool that helps attract meteors to your farm to force the Celestial Mutation. It works kind of like the Lightning Rod or Night Staff, but this one’s made just for the Celestial variant.

It’s a legendary tool, and surprisingly, it's not overly pricey. You can grab the Star Caller for 12,000,000 Sheckles from either the Twilight Shop or Blood Moon Shop, both of which show up during the Night Event.

To use the Star Caller in Grow a Garden , just hold the tool and click anywhere on your farm to place it. Even though it only works during a Meteor Shower, you can set it down anytime. For the best results, place it near your most valuable crops, like Candy Blossom, Moon Mango, or Moon Blossom, to score those Celestial-mutated fruits. Once it's been hit by meteors three times, the tool will vanish.
